idinfo.useconst: None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

procstep.procdesc: This data set was created by loading both River Mile values and latitude/longitude coordinates of section limits existing in the PFBC Fisheries database. The locational values were originally derived from a variety of sources including GPS, scaling from USGS maps and aerial photography. Tools in ArcMap were used to generate the stream sections from these values. Each section was checked against the descriptions contained for each upstream and downstream section limit and the sections were adjusted where necessary. The current 1:24000 National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) flowing waters layer was used as the base for drawing the sections and this data is coincident with NHD.

qhorizpa.horizpae: Layer is based on the National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) flowing water layer.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.
attr.attrdefs: ESRI

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
attr.attrdefs: ESRI

attr.attrdef: Water Resources Data System unique stream identifier
attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection

attr.attrdef: PFBC stream unique identifier (consists of latitude/longitude of the mouth)
attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries

attr.attrdef: Stream mouth latitude in decimal degrees
attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Stream mouth longitude in decimal degrees

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Stream name

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: PFBC Fisheries Management stream section number

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Latitude of the upper limit of the stream section

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: River Mile (uncorrected) of the upper limit of the stream section

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Section upper limit description

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Latitude of the lower limit of the stream section

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Longitude of the upper limit of the stream section

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Longitude of the lower limit of the stream section

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: River Mile (uncorrected) of the lower limit of the stream section

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission
attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for the stream section used in GIS (combo of stream ID and section number)

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Section lower limit description

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission
attr.attrdef: Length of the section in feet calculated by GIS

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission
attr.attrdef: Length of the section in miles calculated by GIS

attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries
attr.attrdef: Name of the Management Program the stream is assigned to
Date the stream section was assigned to the Wilderness Trout Program
attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries

attr.attrdef: Abbreviated county name where the section is located
attr.attrdefs: Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission Bureau of Fisheries

attr.attrdef: Lower Limit Longitude of Section as calculated by GIS - used for driving directions in web GIS

attr.attrdef: Lower Limit Latitude of Section as calculated by GIS - used for driving directions in web GIS

attr.attrdef: Full County name

attr.attrdef: Length of Section in Miles as calculated by GIS
